origin.label: Origin Location
origin.description: The location where the shipment is being picked up.

destination.label: Destination Location
destination.description: The location where the shipment is being delivered.

status.label: Status
status.description: Indicates the current state of the shipment. Reflects the operational status within the system.

revenueCode.label: Renenue Code
revenueCode.description: The revenue code associated with the shipment.

originLocation.label: Origin Location
originLocation.description: The location where the shipment is being picked up.

originAddress.label: Origin Address
originAddress.description: The address of the location where the shipment is being picked up.

originAppointmentWindowStart.label: Origin Appointment Window Start
originAppointmentWindowStart.description: The start of the appointment window for the origin location.

originAppointmentWindowEnd.label: Origin Appointment Window End
originAppointmentWindowEnd.description: The end of the appointment window for the origin location.

destinationLocation.label: Destination Location
destinationLocation.description: The location where the shipment is being delivered.

destinationAddress.label: Destination Address
destinationAddress.description: The address of the location where the shipment is being delivered.

destinationAppointmentWindowStart.label: Destination Appointment Window Start
destinationAppointmentWindowStart.description: The start of the appointment window for the destination location.

destinationAppointmentWindowEnd.label: Destination Appointment Window End
destinationAppointmentWindowEnd.description: The end of the appointment window for the destination location.

equipmentType.label: Equipment Type
equipmentType.description: The type of equipment being used for the shipment.

commodity.label: Commodity
commodity.description: The type of commodity being shipped.

hazardousMaterial.label: Hazardous Material
hazardousMaterial.description: Indicates whether the shipment contains hazardous material.

bolNumber.label: BOL Number
bolNumber.description: The bill of lading number associated with the shipment.

consigneeRefNumber.label: Consignee Reference Number
consigneeRefNumber.description: The reference number associated with the consignee.

temperatureMin.label: Temperature Min
temperatureMin.description: The minimum temperature required for the shipment.

temperatureMax.label: Temperature Max
temperatureMax.description: The maximum temperature required for the shipment.
